notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The meeting was funded through a grant from the WHO Research & Training Programme on Tropical Diseases (TDR). Further support for the meeting was provided through grants from the Institut de Recherche pour le Development (IRD), Montpellier University of Excellence (MUSE), and the Innovative Vector Control Consortium (IVCC). Sponsorships were provided by Valent Biosciences Corporation (Platinum), BASF, Bayer, Goizper Group, Syngenta (Gold), Sumitomo Chemical, Evergreen Land (Silver), Asiatic Agricultural Industries Pte. Ltd., FMC Agro Singapore Pte. Ltd., Godrej, Mitsui Chemicals and New Mountain Innovations (Bronze).
The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, and decision to publish.
